TableField.name: AccountID
TableField.phrase: Record ID|An automatically assigned number used to track accounts used to budance the risk management process

TableField.name: BudgetID
TableField.phrase: Record ID|An automatically assigned number used to track budgets throughout the enterprise

ForeignField.name: OrganizationID
ForeignField.phrase: Budget Organization|The organization responsible for funding and managing the overall budget

ForeignField.name: Organization
ForeignField.phrase: Budget Organization|The organization responsible for funding and managing the overall budget

ForeignField.name: BudgetStartDate
ForeignField.phrase: Start Date|The date the budget was established

ForeignField.name: BudgetEndDate
ForeignField.phrase: End Date|The date the budget expires

ForeignField.name: DaysRemaining
ForeignField.phrase: Days Remaining|The total number of days remaining before the budget expires

ForeignField.name: BudgetCategoryID
ForeignField.phrase: Category|A broad categoy used to group budgets of similar types

CodeField.name: BudgetCategory
CodeField.phrase: Category|A broad categoy used to group budgets of similar types

ForeignField.name: BudgetNumber
ForeignField.phrase: Number|A number used by internal accounting to track budgets and related expenditures

ForeignField.name: BudgetDesc
ForeignField.phrase: Description|A brief but thorough description of the budget and its purpose
ForeignField.sample: An annual budget used to pay for safety program needs

ForeignField.name: Budget
ForeignField.phrase: Budget|A combined field used to describe the budget when associating it with other records

TableField.name: AccountOrganizationID
TableField.phrase: Account Organization|The organization responsible for managing the budget account

ForeignField.name: AccountOrganization
ForeignField.phrase: Account Organization|The organization responsible for managing the budget account

TableField.name: DepartmentID
TableField.phrase: Department|The name of the department associated with the budget account

ForeignField.name: Department
ForeignField.phrase: Department|The name of the department associated with the budget account

RemoteField.name: PersonAccountableID
RemoteField.phrase: Person Accountable|The individual assigned primary accountability for the budget account

ForeignField.name: PersonAccountable
ForeignField.phrase: Person Accountable|The individual assigned primary accountability for the budget account

TableField.name: AccountTypeID
TableField.phrase: Account Type|A combined field used to describe the account type when associating it with other records

ForeignField.name: AccountCategoryID
ForeignField.phrase: Account Category|A broad categoy used to group accounts of similar types

CodeField.name: AccountCategory
CodeField.phrase: Account Category|A broad categoy used to group accounts of similar types

TableField.name: AccountNumber
TableField.phrase: Account Number|A number used by internal accounting to track budget accounts and related expenditures

ForeignField.name: AccountTypeTitle
ForeignField.phrase: Account Type|A title or phrase used to describe a specific type of account

ForeignField.name: AccountTypeDesc
ForeignField.phrase: Description|A brief but thorough description of the specific type of account
ForeignField.sample: A fixed amount of cash available to an employee for purpose of forwarding the company's mission and/or business

ForeignField.name: AccountType
ForeignField.phrase: Account Type|A combined field used to describe the account type when associating it with other records

TableField.name: AccountName
TableField.phrase: Account Name|A unique name or title used to identify the budget account

TableField.name: AccountNumber
TableField.phrase: Account Number|A unique number used to identify the budget account

TableField.name: AccountDesc
TableField.phrase: Account Description|A detailed description of the budget account
TableField.sample: This account is utilized by the employee as a discretionary fund to improve business methods, processes or conditions

TableField.name: AccountAmount
TableField.phrase: Amount|The total amount of money deposited to the budget account

SummaryField.name: Expenditures
SummaryField.phrase: Expenditures|A calculated field representing the total value of all expenditures associated with the budget account

CalculatedField.name: AccountBalance
CalculatedField.phrase: Account Balance|The balance available after subtracting all expenditures associated with the budget account

TableField.name: AccountStatusID
TableField.phrase: Status|Present status of the budget account

CodeField.name: AccountStatus
CodeField.phrase: Status|Present status of the budget account

SummaryField.name: RiskImperatives
SummaryField.phrase: Risk Imperatives|A list of associated Risk Imperatives

CombinedField.name: RecordLabel
CombinedField.phrase: Record Label|The short, concise, label of the record for display purposes

CombinedField.name: Account
CombinedField.phrase: Account|A combined field used to describe this risk budance account when associating it with other records
CombinedField.sample: Mattias Thorslund Risk Control Account; MTT-2004-01; Active

CodeCheckSearchField.name: RiskImperativeID
CodeCheckSearchField.phrase: Risk Imperatives|Filter search results by one or more related risk imperatives

DocumentationSection.title: Introduction
DocumentationSection.p: The installation-specific introduction to the scope and purpose of this module should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said to introduce this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: Implementation
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific implementation rules, policies, practices should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about implementating this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific information regarding the way this module impacts people should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about how this module impacts, or is impacted by, people in general. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.
